name: Production Environment Configuration
description: Defines settings and options for optimizing the application in a production environment.
summary: This configuration file contains critical settings to ensure secure, high-performance operation in production, including logging, caching, URL rewrites, and secure connection settings.

enable-debug-logging.name: Enable Debug Logging
enable-debug-logging.description: Enables debug logging to capture detailed logs for debugging purposes.

enable-syslog-logging.name: Enable Syslog Logging
enable-syslog-logging.description: Enables logging to syslog for better integration with system-wide logging services.

backend-frontname.name: Backend Frontname
backend-frontname.description: Defines the frontend name for the backend interface.

config-async.name: Enable Asynchronous Configuration Loading
config-async.description: Enables asynchronous loading of configuration to improve performance during startup.

cache-id-prefix.name: Cache ID Prefix
cache-id-prefix.description: Defines the prefix to be used in cache keys.

allow-parallel-generation.name: Allow Parallel Cache Generation
allow-parallel-generation.description: Allows cache generation to run in parallel, potentially improving performance during large builds.

document-root-is-pub.name: Document Root is Public
document-root-is-pub.description: Set the document root to be public, making files accessible publicly through the web server.

use-secure-admin.name: Use Secure Admin Panel
use-secure-admin.description: Enables a secure admin panel, forcing all admin panel interactions to use HTTPS.

admin-use-security-key.name: Enable Admin Security Key
admin-use-security-key.description: Enable the use of a security key for admin access for extra security.

use-rewrites.name: Enable URL Rewrites
use-rewrites.description: Enables the use of URL rewrites to customize URL structure.

use-secure.name: Use Secure Connection
use-secure.description: Forces the use of secure HTTPS connections for the application.

base-url-secure.name: Base URL for Secure Connection
base-url-secure.description: Defines the base URL for secure HTTPS connections.

sales-order-increment-prefix.name: Sales Order Increment Prefix
sales-order-increment-prefix.description: Sets the prefix for sales order increments, allowing customization of order IDs.
